text: Jesús de Santesteban (5 November 1866 — ??) was a Basque pianist and composer, son of José Antonio Santesteban, grandson of José Juan Santesteban. He studied at Conservatoire de Paris. In 1893 he became Officier d'Académie. Composed different salon pieces. == External links == * Jesús de Santesteban in Enciclopedia Auñamendi Category:1866 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Spanish classical pianists Category:Male classical pianists Category:Basque classical composers Category:Conservatoire de Paris alumni
title: Jesús de Santesteban
